instantChanges: Soul Bound trait; instead of choosing a side effect, the Astropath permanently loses their sight
Unnatural Senses (X) trait; where X equals the Astropath's Willpower characteristic.
Gain access to Astropath psychic power discipline

talents.name: Bound to the Highest Power
talents.description: The Astropath may spend a Fate Point to ignore a Psychic Phenomena she has rolled (including a result of Perils of the Warp), completely negating its effects. Doing so requires her to distance herself from the Warp, and she cannot use the Focus Power action or sustain psychic powers until the start of her next turn.

talents.name: Supreme Telepath
talents.description: Before making a Focus Power test to manifest a power from the Telepathy discipline or the Astropath discipline, the Astropath may spend a Fate point to increase her psy rating by an amount equal to half her Willpower bonus (rounded down) for that test.

talents.name: Second Sight
talents.description: The value of the Astropath's Unnatural Senses trait increases to twice her Willpower characteristic.

talents.name: Soul Ward
talents.description: The Astropath may re-roll Willpower tests she must make due to Psychic Phenomena or Perils of the Warp, tests to avoid gaining mutations, and tests to resist daemonic possession.

talents.name: Warp Awareness
talents.description: The Astropath may use her Psyniscience skill in place of her Awareness skill for Awareness tests.
